Main Title: Fraud of Disney + Hotstar VIP OTT platform
Full Review: Disney+Hotstar OTT platform stream all star tv contents in India. They had advertised that for VIP subscription they will stream all TV programs 12 hours in advance at 6 am daily. On this promise I had subscribed one year fees for VIP membership to watch my Star-Jalsha Bengali TV channels Bengali serials in advance. But actually it was a fake advertisement by Hotstar. Most of the TV serials are streamed only a couple of hours in advance of telecast instead of streaming 12 hours in advance. When I raised complaint to top management Mr. Sunil Rayan President and Head Disney+ Hotstar I have received response from customer support and from Pooja Kumbhare executive with all sorts of bullshit excuses of Covid situation etc. In the same condition another OTT platform Zee5 is streaming all Zee TV programs 24 hours in advance to their club members hours. The same production house(viz. Tent Cinema) who are supplying their contents to Zee5 on time but they default for Hotstar. This shows poor management and high corruption by Disney+ Hotstar management. We the subscriber are the worst sufferer.     DO NOT SUBSCRIBE DISNEY+HOTSTAR OTT STREAMING SERVICE AND GET CHEATED.

The series Special Ops was a good one to watch but others such as Aarya and hostages were not worth watching. Hello everyone     I will be sharing my experience and my review on Disney+ Hotstar. It was just Hotsar but after getting merged with Disney it has become Disney+ Hotstar. It's a streaming service where you can enjoy different TV shows of different Channels movies latest and old released films Hotstar original TV series and the live sports available in different languages. The Hotstar VIP pack now cost Rs 400 /- annually and the Hotstar Premium cost around Rs 1500/- annually. The only difference between the two-pack is that in the premium pack gives more Hollywood movies series and Disney+ content.     I have purchased the bio pack and almost a year I am enjoying the service. A very budget-friendly pack it's like spending just more than 1rs daily. The streaming quality is just awesome no interruption on the live news channel and on. My mom's watching her serials from the first episode which is not possible on the cable and dish tv.     A very nice and clean user interface with a perfect animation. Never faced any issues with the service.     A very nice streaming app.

Hotstar is one of the worst entertainment app which I have ever used in my lifetime.First of all the app is not stable especially if you are watching through TV.one you select any movie or a show it may not open.Support team will blame your device by default but will not offer any solution.Secondly they offer a show or movie only for a specific time period just to attract customers.once I subscribed to watch Friends tv show.After one month they removed the show.When I raised the issue they said rights for the show had got over.I was very disappointed with hotstar.Some of the limitations of hotstar are as follows.     1) .Concept: It provides very low picture quality with no high graphics in the display.You can only have one screen of premium content opened on one account at a time.You can watch in up to 2 devices only.If you have shared the password with your friends and also you have logged in your mobile as well as on your desktop then hotstar will not allow you to watch at the same time.     2) .Reliability and satisfaction: One cannot gets satisfied easily after watching content on hotstar It does not work with incognito mode It uses too much of data It requires high speed of data one cannot use it with slow speed of data.     3) .Subscription: Their subscription plans are really high one cannot easily afford them they charges high amount for average service.     4) .Service and support: It is not able to recover from temporary network issues always one needs to refresh the page If you go backward or forward it starts buffering all over again Their service quality is very low one cannot gets satisfied after having a conversation with their service team as they does not try to solve your issue Sometimes they behaves rudely and harshly with you.     5) .User friendly: It always displays lots of ads while watching content.If someone wanted to give them feedback it asks to login via facebook     FROM MY PERSONAL EXPERIENCE I STRICTLY RECOMMEND NOT TO PREFER HOTSTAR.

Main Title: No refund on cancellation and buggy video player
Full Review: Hi     I used hotstart for 3 months and had purchased an annual subscription. After some time their video player stopped doing rewind or perper pause and play for matches. That really annoyed me and lot of other people because the whole point of an online streaming video player is to allow for pause and play.     I called to ask for a fix and they had no timeline available for that.     I decided to move to another service and tried to cancel my subscription. They told me that they have a fine print in their plan that NO REFUND is allowed if you cancel your subscription. HOW IS THAT POSSIBLE? This is shady business practice. Tomorrow they stop providing service and refuse the refund also this is completely unethical and that should be made illegal. I am going to consult a lawyer to see if this is even allowed in US. I am using it from California.

If I had to write this review 3 years back when hotstar was just launched I would have given hotstar full 5 stars As I had watched a lot of cricket matches on hotstar giving up on my monthly 1 gb for just 1 match anyways.     As of now the content on hotstar is very less compared to other apps such as amazon prime or netflix.     The number of movies that you can watch on hotstar is also very less even when you buy premium membership.     The amount of data hotstar consumes is very large The quality is not at all good in medium or low so I usually watch in high quality and just after one show of 1 hour I get a message of 50% consumption.     Nowadays the app also has started to slow down a bit it takes time to open a movie or browse through shows.     The user interface and overall app development is also not good compared to netflix and amazon prime which provide amazing user experience.     Overall the app and website is good but I do not recommend going for premium inhotstar as features are not upto the mark compared to other apps and websites     I hope the review was useful     Thank you

Main Title: Dont fall pray to the offers Hotstar gives
Full Review: I am a victim of Hotstar's Lucrative offers. I received coupon code offer which said if I avail it @$59 I would get$50 Amazon Gift card. I thought at least for cricket Hotstar is good so I opted one and received an email form Hotstar that my Amazon Gift card is on its way and soon reach my mail box please don't cancel the subscription. here came the bad part abt Hotstar     1) When I tried to see Ind Vs Newzeland it was not available and I had to get ESPN for that     2) My coupon never arrived so I call Hotstar and they started giving lame excuses that My coupon was not associated with my email address registered. My Question was if that was not associated why did they even allow my transaction and send me the email confirmation.     3) When I call the customer service they dropped my call 7 times     Actually I am guessing they have been trained for that     4) When I asked them to cancel my subscription they said they'll do that but as it is an annual subscription I won't get any refund which really is not fair as I have multiple annual subscriptions but no one has this kind of rule. Every customer should have fair Exit Option of paying only for the used time and getting a refund of unused     So the advice based on the experience now is don't believe on Hot Star's Lucrative offers . Read them extra carefully as they cant be compared with Champs like Netfix. Stars() in Hot Star are dangerous and less customer centered. As it looks like they have similar modus operands to cheat new prospects.

Main Title: Look like this will be a downfall for STAR TV
Full Review: I am watching STAR more than 15 years in USA. Last night when I dont't get on my regular TV then I sign up last night my intent was to sign up for one month and use a promotion code. I don't see any option for any of these on sign up screen. No disclaimer or any confirmation for the total payment charge on card. With just one click my card was charge for 99.99. Then I found there is no app for my Samung TV I use my Apple TV and found it NOT TV any more just a streaming service just like Netflix. So I call to cancel the service no response but there is an advice to sen email on help@hotstar.com with a promise that I will get reply in four hours. I am still waiting that reply even after 24 hours past. I called my master . card and explain and will get my refund. With this experience I am 100% sure this will not work for US. One last thing I believe Hotstar also doing a tax fraud by not charging or paying state and local taxes.

Main Title: A terrible waste of an app

Main Title: Very useful in outdoors for watching tv live.
Full Review: Hello friends today I'll tell you about Hotstar. Hotstar is an online video streaming service which offers a lot of quality tv shows movies and sports in eight different languages. the service was launched in february 2015 by star india solely for the audience of India. The service started with some live cricket matches and some of the regional shows but later that year they added a lot of premium english shows and movies to hold the audience. If you go through it's quality Hotstar comes with 3 options( 720p hd 360p standard and 180p low) to select from. You can also switch to auto mode which will adjust itself according to internet speed of the device. In my last words I want to advise you that if you guys miss your tv shows or movies during outside of home then it's a good app for you.     Thanking you for reading!

Hello Buddies!     Today I am going to review a popular app and website 'Hotsar'.     It is amongst the best live streaming apps. My all preferred tv shows are streamed here. Whenever I am outside and my favorite show timing is on then I just open the app and enjoy my time.     I am using hotstar since October 2017. It is the excellent alternative to a television. I used to travel long routes and getting bored is natural. Hotstar is the best solution for relinquishing my time. I enjoy watching movies serials cricket matches etc.     With hotstar I can follow live matches without any buffering problem. It only requires a proper internet connection.     The layout of Application and design are admirable and eye-catching. The website as well as the app is very easy to use.     I used to have lots of conflicts with my siblings over watching live matches on television as each of them has different choices but this problem has been resolved by hotstar as I can watch whatever I want.     The app comes with the facility to download the content on our device for watching it later offline especially devices with moderate Internet connections. This is also one of the best features of the 'Hotstar App'.They keep on attaching fresh contents every now and then and keep us notified too.     The app also works excellent though sometimes you may get error playback because of some server glitches or bad internet connection. But it is not a big issue.     It has been a great experience with this app. You can watch your favorite content for free which you cannot watch on any other site or app. You just need to sign up or you can easily sign up from your Facebook account.     A great application and site to use and relinquish your time.     Thank you!     : )

The hotstar is app as well as website where you can stream contents online such as sports movies serial and shows     I generally used hotstar for watching sports video since it can easily play video in different network speed even at 2G speed it can run sports video without any buffering     the concept of this app is not though new as there were also other tv app availaible     but the app is very well optimised and offer lag free experience     also there is feature of auto download when connected to wifi and then the download will automatically resumes.     So it saves your phone data plan     The app has several movies and web series which is exclusively available on hotstar     The movie are again not though new released but you can see 2 or 3 month ago released movie for free     Even you can download these movie and save on your internal memory and can watch anytime later     There are also many serials available to enjoy     And the live cricket shows are there if you like seeing sports     And the most usefulness feature is you get highlight and different cropped section of sports video of several players which is very nice and time saving instead of wat hing the whole match     ( Especially If you are a fan of any sportsman and watch the sport because of him)     Overall the concept is slightly improved and the app also work fine though some times you get error playback due to some server glitches or poor internet speed otherwise it works nice     Thanks for reading this review please do rate it and follow me for such review     Thank you !

Hi Friends Today I am going to share my personal experience on the'Hotstar' Appliction which is freely available on the play store app. As we all know Hotstar is the application which allows you to watch all the star related channels online like star sports star plus etc. Concept for making this app is really good but executuion fails. This app is having lots of troubleshooting problems that I am going to discuss here.     First a fall hotstar did not allow you to download the video offline. Also while playing the videos on Hotstar you did not get option to select video quality. It takes too much data to load the videos as well as taking too much time to butter the videos. Sometimes it gets automatically sign out from the application and getting unknown error. There is no problem in wifi or data connection this application is only having an issue with it. So they need to work on this a lot. As compared to this application Youtube is the best app ever its provide the features more than this app and working in flawless condition.     Layout and design of this app is quite simple and average. User interface is also quite easy to access it. But its taking too much space to install in your device and also needs to be updated on the regular basis otherwise its not working properly.     While watching the videos on this app there will be a lots of ads in between the video that we can't skip. They need to removed those all excessive advertisements. While watching live cricket matches on this app there is lots of issues that we faced its playing video in an interrupted network. Its very lack the app while watching the online videos and battery heated very fast and its slow downs the processor speed. The quality of videos were not even good at all.     Overall its not a perfect application that fulfills your requirements. So I will not suggest this app to anyone. I hope my review will help you to take right decision.

Hi friends I would like to share my personal experience on the'Hotstar' application. Previously I was supposed to used this application to watch live cricket match only but app was not helpful as services provided by this application is not good at all. Hence I uninstalled this app from my mobile.     As we all aware about the hotstar application and it is very popular app for watching live sports like cricket football pro kabaddi hockey tennis etc. Hotstar is a good looking app in design and layout as well smoothly runs on android as well as ios OS. Concept for making this app is good but execution fails. Everytime we need to update this app on regular basis otherwise this application won't work properly.     Everything about this app is quite well until we started to play videos on it. The app doesn't have any options for adjust the video quality. The main problem with this app is interrupted network while using this app sometimes in between you will get automatically logout and sometimes its shown unknown error - please try again later like this. Also its taking too much time to load the videos. This app having lots of bugs and they need to improve on this app efficiency.     If you are watching a live video on the hotstar and suddenly you got a call on your mobile if you lift the call and come back again on hotstar to watch that video again then you will not get that facility. You have again watch the video from starting point.     So overall it is not a perfect app for watching live streaming videos online. So I will not recommend this application to anyone. I hope my review will help you to find better option.

Main Title: Eats alot of data like GBs
Full Review: Hi there I have recently started using hotstar app in my phone. The best feature I think is the quality you can adjust and it gives you an estimation of how much it will cost data on how much quality in one hour. The usefulness of this app can be understood when you are out of the house. And it helps you to see the game. The app does not show every single channel of TV the app gives you Low 144p 240p  Medium 360p 480p High 720p 1080p display quality options. Its up to you to choose the quality. Some drama show episodes require a premium package of Hot star which is in app purchase but in my opinion it is okay now don't miss any matches or show.

The design of Hotstar app for Live TV streaming is not extraordinary. Its smoothly done tiled layout is visually appealing and ensures you have a convenient time selecting the videos to play. As far as bandwidth requirement is concerned it works very well on WiFi network as well as 3G network. You will be pleasantly surprised to hear that it works decent enough even with 2G connections. However it would be advisable to atleast use a 3G connection for catching up live streaming of TV shows or sports events or movies.     There is no compulsory requirement to register for downloading or using the Hotstar app. However to access your video after an interruption at the same point where you left it( pause and resume playback feature) you need to have registered earlier. Similarly to create a Hotstar playlist of videos shows etc. To be watched in a particular sequence you need registration. You can even rate the videos viewed using the Like and Dislike options.     This app supports streaming of regional language TV shows in India for languages like Malayalam Kannada Marathi Bengali etc. Apart from normal Hindi TV shows. You can watch Live telecast of popular Hindi TV shows online like Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai Diya Aur Baati Hum Yeh Hai Mohabbatein etc. You would be excited to know that you can revisit full episodes of some of the past favorite TV shows like Khichdi Sarabhai vs Sarabhai Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi etc.     Even for watching English TV shows online you need not make use of any Torrents site to download them. Using this app you can watch your favorite English TV shows( across all seasons) like Prison Break The Empire Homeland Modern Family etc. It enables you to catch shows from various TV channels like Star Plus Star World Life OK Asianet Channel V Star Vijay Star Jalsha Star One Star Pravah Suvarna etc.     This app also provides access to full-length Bollywood blockbuster movies.The only costs involved while using this amazing video streaming app are the data or mobile internet charges for streaming videos and downloading videos. So it is no surprise that you will have to watch some in-video ads or ads at the start of any video on Hotstar app. I have started using this app for free on my Android smartphone and found it pretty handy.

Hotstar is an app developed by Star networks.     It is used for live streaming watching various shows and movies.     Design-     Hotstar is an easy to use and user friendly app.The design is quite simplistic and common to many video apps these days.     A common homepage shows all the trending content and different menu lets you select different categories.     It also lets you set your language preferences and displays content accordingly.     Content-     Hotstar contains mostly all the shows that are shown on various Star network tv channels like Star Plus Star World Star Movies Star Sports etc.     It also has live streaming services for sports.     It also has a vast collection of movies in various languages.     There are also few international shows and movies but the collection is not that great.     Streaming-     Most of the times the shows and movies are easily streamed without any hindrance.     Sometimes there are app crashes during advertisements.     You also get options for the quality of streaming to save data.     All in all it is a very useful app for watching shows and movies and is quite dependable.

Hotstar is an application from Star network to watch your favourites TV shows latest news movies and live sports playing on star network.     In terms of content the app have lot of things to watch on like English premier league Indian premier league ICC world championship etc as the star network owns the broadcast rights. .     The only positive things about the app is that it has got a great UI design and content.     There is a list of negatives:        The app doesn't have any setting to choose the video quality of the content.        the app plays unskippable ADs        very bad at handling interruptions like call notification and switching of apps.        It have got several bugs like the app is not handling the AD played in between some times the spinner icon is not disappearing after buffering.           If you are a fan of Indian TV shows then is a nice app to have otherwise a BIG NO.

Hotstar is an on demand video online platform where we can stream videos of TV shows Movies and Sports available in more than eight languages. Hotstar is ready for use as an android and iOS Movie app as well as a web portal. The best part about Hotstar is that it offers a solution to the three major problems that plague us today.     Never having enough time.     Never having enough money.     An insatiable love for all things televised.     The idea of Hotstar was hatched by the Star India Ltd. enterprise exclusively for the Indian audience. It is common knowledge that the one thing that unites all the different generations of India is the television. Often mock wars break out in households over who gets control over the TV remote. In such a scenario Hotstar comes in as a life saver.     HOW EXPENSIVE IS IT | ( PLAN & PRICING) ?     It’s absolutely free in the case of both cost and hassle. There is no compulsory need to even register in the Hotstar network. All you have to do is either download the app or visit the Hotstar web page and go to town on it.     At the time of the launch the Hotstar owners saw the only mode of revenue from the ads that they promote. However the spread of Hotstar like wild fire among the Indian audience has changed things up a bit. Now to ensure the continued use Hotstar has widened its horizons especially regarding the type of movies and series that it stream.     The Hotstar premium was set up recently in light of the launch of Game of Thrones season six. At the cost of INR 200 a lot of exclusive premium content can be accessed by the customers. The whole procedure is blissfully simple – only asking you to register with your email id and provide some basic bank account details. The only criterion is the fact that the membership can be taken only via card payment. But that’s not much of a bother in the 21st century is it?     WHY HOTSTAR IS A HOT COMMODITY?     Who wouldn’t want the freedom of going out without the worry of missing your favourite daily soap? Men fall over themselves at the opportunity to stream international matches at such a low cost watching your favourite movies at leisure and no more fighting over the rights on the television. Each person has unlimited access to their guilty pleasures. Hotstar gained popularity among indian youth during 2015 Cricker world cup. Which became the Only Source of streaming for Office Workers.     Having a registered account also lets you load playlists of must watch videos. You can even resume the streaming from the point where you had stopped. Hotstar not only streams the new episodes of a Show but also provides us with all the episodes of all the seasons of a show from the beginning. Planning on binge watching your favourite series? Get settled with some popcorn and log onto Hotstar.     THE GROWTH OF HOTSTAR IN INDIA     The biggest milestone was definitely their deal with HBO. After the launch of Game of thrones and its subsequently becoming the most pirated series ever especially in South Asia HBO has been actively working on making it available to users on a legal platform and as a part of that they have signed a deal to bring it to the Indian followers legally.     From just having a handful of TV shows and Movies in a few select languages it has grown into a giant that claims a bounty of many of the most sought after TV shows and movies as well as sports in more than eight languages.     QUALITY AND SPEED     You can choose the quality of the videos you want to stream from an array of four options 720p HD 360p standard 180p low and an auto mode. The auto mode adjusts the quality according to the specifications of the device the individual is using.     The speed of the video streaming depends on the data connection that each person uses. 2G connections are said to have moderately good streaming speed but it is also heavily recommended that one use at least a 3G connection for a good experience and off course higher the speed less the lag during streaming. The videos will

Hotstar has always been a back up at my place when we miss the daily soap. My mom is hooked up to the television(read Star Plus) from 5 PM to 9:30 PM. She doesn’t change the channel or lets us change the channel. She watches every show in that slot. There are days when we have to go out and it is unavoidable and we do miss the daily soap.     When Hotstar was launched we didn’t really use it but later my brother came to the rescue of my mother and introduced us to Hotstar. It has every show from Star Networks. So my mom is more than happy to now miss her shows as she knows she can watch it next day.     The quality of Hotstar is very nice plus you can change the streaming quality. It has different categories for TV serials Talk shows Regional shows Movies etc.     They also have sports events been shown on the App which is quite amazing for the entire sports fanatic out there.     There are some TV serials and movies that are premium and trust me these are the real good stuff. The basic shows and movies are free to use and of good quality.     The speed of the app completely depends on your Wi-Fi and Data connection. This can be played on laptop through the website and on the phone through the app. It cannot be connected to the TV through Screen Mirroring which is a little disappointing.     All in all I like the app but more features and more variety in series and movies will be appreciated.

Main Title: Hotstar- A whole new way of Entertainment
Full Review: This is a rather interesting development.     Hotstar – the entertainment service backed by Star India – has now evolved into a pretty neat thing. And I guess it’s all thanks to Netflix.     For a significantly lower price of Rs.199/month(compared to Netflix’s Rs.650/month) Hotstar offers an HD-service(Netflix‘s non-HD service is priced at Rs.500/month) and more importantly it offers some of the most-popular TV shows currently airing. The list is of course led by Game of Thrones(in fact most of Hotstar‘s ads are led by this show!) and also includes other HBO shows like Silicon Valley(whoo-hoo!) and Veep all uncensored. That’s a really good deal considering the fact that a pack of HD channels on TV costs more per month offering censored versions of these shows.     The movie catalogue is also pretty impressive although I haven’t paid much attention to the list so far.     The service does have one big negative issue and it is that it is not compatible with Chromecast. So the desktop/app cannot be cast on to a TV at least not directly(the workaround to this isn’t very efficient)     I’d say that if you can afford it a subscription to both Hotstar and Netflix can help confidently cancel your cable TV subscription.

Main Title: A great concept but needs a lot of improvement
Full Review: I am using Hotstar app from last one month now as it is an online platform where you can see movies sports or any tv channel on the go with their app or the site.     I am a big fan of Indian cricket and most of the times I have to see the live streaming on this app as I cant sit with TV @ home.     The great thing in the app is the user interface which is exceptionally done by the developers and the availability of approx all the TV programs on their site or app.     Also it is available in some regional languages.     But the most disappointed thing(which should be the priority) with the app is that it takes a hell lot of time to buffer anything whether u r watching any comedy show or watching cricket match or anything. Which kills the moment of the show/match.     There are so many lags in the app like u cant drag at times or u cant see the thumbnails for easier usage. Also there is no option for downloading which must be there so that u can watch your fav shows without buffering.     It needs a lot of improvement to be recommended from my side. irrespective of the concept.

Some people might say you get live sports programmes etc but you can also receive the same in YouTube and starsports.com etc.     They have some shows like Boston legal sons of anarchy the Russians etc but it gets streamed in low quality even on a 10mbps connection along with full page ads which is a big bummer and the organisation of shows in the app is haphazard and it does not look professional. I will stick to YouTube and other websites for now. Hotstar try being professional drop the full page ads improve streaming and add more shows provide HD streaming for matches don't stop at 480p and don't emblazon your logo everywhere it is annoying.

We have come to an age where entertainment is not just contained in our living rooms and on the computer screens in our bedrooms it has become ubiquitous we can carry them in our own pockets. Hotstar is one such app that gives us entertainment on demand but there are a lot of niggling issues that the app developers have not solved and which lets it down finally.     The Interface - Very good looking app both the android and IOS versions looks the same with hardly any discrepancies. But nothing over the top nothing that you havent seen before. The screen has a tabular architecture for different forms of content. Swipe and you go to the subsequent sections     Content - The content is updated timely even recent match highlghts an the epiosoded of your favourite shows can be found. Full marks for it in this part.     Performance - This is the part where the app loses most of its marks interface lags and slows down on phones with less than 2 GB of RAM it is not optimised for lower memory or lower bandwidth which is bad there is no download facility either which is a bummer.Overall nice looking app that performs badly. Expected a lot felt let down finally.

The Hotstar App from Star India gives you a chance to watch the most recent films TV shows and live games complimentary and is accessible on Android and iOS. This sounds great on paper yet practically speaking swings out to an instance of pipe dream as a decent outline and promising library are let around huge execution issues.     As far as substance the application has various things you can watch at this moment. Star India claims a few TV slots crosswise over dialects and kinds and has telecast rights for a few noteworthy donning competitions for example the ICC Cricket World Cup English Premier League ISL Hockey India League among others.     With Star Plus it has a great deal of substance that is made in India and for the application there is additionally some English dialect substance for example American shows like Prison Break and Modern Family. This gives it a boundless expansiveness of substance that it needs to give you a chance to watch online(and once in a while disconnected from the net as well) by means of the Hotstar application.     Plan. Hotstar is an attractive application also. It ran easily on an iPhone 5s. An engaging tiled format makes it simple to locate the best features. This isn't something progressive yet well-done in any case.     A burger symbol(three flat lines) on the upper left gives you a chance to get to your playlists downloads and a portion of the curated areas(Home Collections and so forth). The inquiry symbol is on the upper right in case you're searching for something particular. The primary screen shows features from different classes composed perfectly into tabs for example Featured Sports TV Shows and Movies. You can swipe either side to go to the following area and tap any feature to begin playing it. In general we loved the smooth moves the application gave.     Library     We weren't hoping to see an excess of features accessible almost immediately as the application depiction says that more will be included a week after week premise. We were charmingly astonished to see that the application as of now has a great deal of substance. A few shows have more than 1 500 scenes to watch and some of them are accessible to watch online or as downloads for disconnected from the net survey. On the off chance that you are an enthusiast of Star's TV shows then this application will give you a chance to get up to speed with your top picks.     The application portrayal claims that motion pictures are not accessible for downloads because of rights issues but rather all shows are. This case is not valid as at the season of composing - we couldn't download some new shows for example Everest and Mahakumbh. It is disillusioning to see this inconsistency as it is by all accounts a valuable usefulness considering for the most part poor availability in India.     The library looks a considerable measure more restricted when you take a gander at global motion pictures and TV shows accessible and the games segment is really uncovered right now. The application portrayal guarantees live games yet doesn't say what will be accessible live. So it is difficult to prescribe this application to games fans right now. It's additionally important that Star India's Star Sports application portrayal says it is the authority application for ICC World Cup 2015 spilling so Hotstar is liable to pass up a great opportunity for any World Cup activity.     Execution     Everything about this application looked great until we began doing the genuine article - playing features. The application doesn't have any setting to give you a chance to pick feature quality and rather consequently modifies feature quality in light of your association speed. On the other hand you shouldn't expect HD features notwithstanding when you're associated on your rapid broadband at home. Hotstar's streams are not too awful on telephones but rather begin to look hazy on an iPad.     The application plays an unskippable 1-moment commercial toward the start of a few features yet on a moderate 512kbps association we saw that the notice needed to cradle thrice. There's no play-delay control here so our just decision was to tap the screen which stacks the promoter's site(for this situation it was starsports.com) in the application and close that to make the notice get done with playing. The feature we played additionally cradled a few times however that is a considerable measure not exactly what we're utilized to on that moderate association. The execution was better on a speedier Internet association.     The most serious issue with the Hotstar iOS application is the manner by which it handles intrusions. How often have you been watching a feature on your cell phone just for you to get a call or a warning for an instant message? For our situation it happens constantly. Be that as it may when we addressed the call and came back to the Hotstar application it had returned to the home screen. We needed to discover and play the feature from the earliest starting point again and discover our place physically in the wake of viewing the unskippable promotion once more. This is an unnecessarily disappointing background for clients. The same thing happened when we answered to two or three iMessage messages and came back to Hotstar. For a generally all around composed application we were exceptionally baffled to see such an essential thing disregarded.     The application additionally has a few other irritating bugs. A green spinner symbol showed up once when we tapped the Play Movie catch and kept focused even after the feature started playing. We needed to constrain close the application to dispose of it. We downloaded a 208MB feature yet it declined to appear in the Downloads segment. We couldn't download it again as the catch was turned gray out however we couldn't watch it logged off either.     Conclusion     Hotstar is a decent application to have on the off chance that you are keen on Indian TV however we'd be a great deal more content in the event that it let you continue features from where you ceased on the off chance that you addressed a call or incidentally shut the application. It's totally free(with feature promotions) which is without a doubt an or more. Be that as it may this application would be much all the more engaging once basic bugs are altered.

Hotstar is the best app to see the star plus shows on this android app.     You can watch star daily shows live cricket movies clips etc.     Well. seeing the daily shows on my mobile is really a great thing. I only once see the live cricket match on it when my cable had gone and I was so disappointed as far as quality of the picture of match is concern. as it was so blurry. and it takes so much time to start. and buffers so many time. well this is a part where they need to improve there app.     Overall a very good app. for watching shows and movies . The newly launched Hotstar App is a treat for all people who wish to see their favorite shows and channels at any time any place. It has several categories like TV Shows Clips Movies and Sports and is free to use. I had installed this app a few months ago and I am quite satisfied with it. With the recent shows I was able to enjoy some of the popular old shows with minimum breaks.     The only problem I had is with watching the live cricket matches. I couldn't find the streaming good and the picture quality was a bit blurred. Moreover Hotstar ofders shows which were telecast only on Star network. They should start showing shows of other channels like Zee Tv Sony and Colors. It is somewhat like Youtube but I still like using this app because it also allows me to watch entire bollywood movies which feature is not in YouTube. Watching movies at the comfort of my home on my phone is a very good feature of this app. All in all a good app but can improve to become the best.
